category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Additional_Date_Region
preference.preference_description: Defines an additional supported lauguage and country code for Teamcenter rich client date widget to display calendar complying with country convention. The format of value for this preference is mapping of eclipse language country code and jquery datepicker regional code, i.e. "eclipse_lauguage_country_code=jquery_regional_code". For example, user wants to add united kingdom locale for date widget, eclipse_lauguage_country_code for united kingdom is "en_GB", jquery_region_code is "en-GB", the proference value would be: en_GB=en-GB The preference does not have any value by default.
